LOC: Location. Named entities related to geographical locations, including countries, cities, rivers, etc. Example: Paris, Amazon River.
MISC: Miscellaneous. Named entities that do not fit into other categories, such as events, nationalities, works of art, etc. Example: Olympics, French.
ORG: Organization. Named entities related to organizations, including companies, government agencies, non-governmental organizations, etc. Example: Google, United Nations.
PER: Person. Named entities related to individuals, including real people and fictional characters. Example: Albert Einstein, Harry Potter.
